ingest-processing.normalization: Yes, PDF 1.7 would be converted into PDF/A-1b.

long-term-strategy.original: Migrate to newer PDF revisions when the PDF major version number changes (i.e. PDF 2.0) or to a format that shares the essential and distinguishing characteristics of the PDF 1.7 specification.

short-term-actions.action: Continue to monitor and evaluate the suitability of PDF to PDF/A-1 conversion tool for PDF/A-1 to become the normalized format of PDF 1.6.

action-plan.footnote: This action plan is currently under discussion and is subject to change.
